summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6163 for the improvement of Spencer Street from 52nd Avenue South to 51st Place South; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86244, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Loal Improvement Fund.
